name: Mark Grayson / Invincible

physical_specifications.build: Athletic, muscular build  — broad shoulders (~23 inches), pronounced pectorals visible through suit texture, narrow waist (~31 inches) for a V-shaped torso; arms well-developed with visible biceps and forearm contour under the suit.
physical_specifications.posture: Confident, squared shoulders, chest forward, neck upright, gaze level toward camera.
physical_specifications.body_proportions: Leg length ~54% of height; arms proportional, reaching mid-thigh at rest.

facial_structure.chin: Squared with slight roundness, no cleft.
facial_structure.nose: Straight bridge, medium width, slightly rounded tip.
facial_structure.mouth: Medium fullness lips; neutral expression; lips closed.
facial_structure.skin_texture: Smooth, realistic pore detail; faint natural texture visible under daylight.

hair.length_cut: Italian hair. Cinematic undercut with sharp faded sides, long thick top swept back in textured waves, glossy strands catching light, windswept highlights for a bold, heroic look. Short sides with longer (~4–5 inches).
hair.color: Jet black (HEX #1B1B1B) with soft natural highlights.
hair.texture: Thick, straight, matte finish, voluminous front wave.

costume.material: High-quality matte stretch leather-composite with visible grain and slight creasing under tension.
costume.primary_color: Golden yellow (HEX #FFD84D) forming a sharp downward V from shoulders to upper abdomen, covering upper chest and continuing onto inner arms and forearm cuffs.
costume.secondary_color: Deep navy blue (HEX #1B2B45) covering torso sides, outer arms, abdomen, and legs.
costume.tertiary_color: Desaturated teal-blue (HEX #2B6A7A) as small upper-chest panels near armpits.
costume.design_details: Form-fitted paneling with rounded yellow shoulder caps and seamless teal-blue accent panels; no armor plating.
costume.gloves: Golden yellow leather integrated into suit, extending from mid-forearm to fingers.
costume.boots: Golden yellow boots reaching just below the knee, smooth leather with minimal seams, integrated with navy leg panels.

accessories.description: Thick yellow wraparound sports sunglasses with wide arms and yellow mirrored lenses (not aviators).

lighting_behavior: Neutral three-point lighting with soft key, cool fill, and faint rim light; lock exposure and white balance.
voice_style: Target: Steven Yeun as Mark performance — youthful mid‑high tenor, warm, earnest; cadence natural, emotional; ~155 wpm; neutral American; studio-dry, close-mic; no reverb/chorus; no robotic TTS artefacts; soft breaths allowed.
